title: I cant see some of my recent matches in my normal match history.
body: This is kinda bugging me can you fix it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This issue is currently being investigated by Riot, it should be resolved soon.

Edit: Update, the issue has been resolved & match history should be caught up in a few hours.
it is to the same for me, it is giving me a frighten
yeh  having the same issue... its starting to irritate me aswell
my promotional series have been reset after winning 2 games ^^ quite irritating too...
